snippet: Scott Burcham singled in the winning run in extra innings Monday to lead Israel over South Korea 2-1 in the opening game of the World Baseball Classic....

headline.main: Former Nigerian Governor Jailed for Five Years for Corruption
headline.print_headline: Former Nigerian Governor Jailed for Five Years for Corruption

lead_paragraph: Scott Burcham singled in the winning run in extra innings Monday to lead Israel over South Korea 2-1 in the opening game of the World Baseball Classic.
